Title: Strike action to start on Sep. 7 at Chevron's Gorgon, Wheatstone facilities
Description: Australian labour union the Offshore Alliance has served notices of protected industrial action at Chevron’s Gorgon and Wheatstone onshore facilities and its offshore Wheatstone platform, following votes in favour of taking strike action by the oil and gas firm’s employees at these facilities on Aug. 24 and today. The action will begin on Sep. 7 and is expected to curb production and exports from the 8.9 mtpa Wheatstone and 15.6 mtpa Gorgon LNG plants.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks up to four LNG cargoes for delivery in October to December
Description: Thaland’s state-owned energy firm PTT seeks up to four LNG cargoes for delivery to the Map Ta Phut LNG receiving terminal in Rayong province through a tender closing on Aug. 31.
Author: CK

Title: Chevron’s offshore Wheatstone workers also vote for strike action
Description: Employees at Chevron’s offshore Wheatstone platform in Western Australia have voted to take strike action in a protected action ballot that closed today, raising the possibility of supply disruptions from the 8.9 mtpa Wheatstone LNG plant as a result.
Author: CK
